citation: Schulhoff et al., HackAPrompt: Exposing Systemic Vulnerabilities of LLMs (EMNLP 2023), https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.16119
note: Dataset requires accepting Hugging Face conditions (share contact info) to access. To download: 1) Log in at Hugging Face, 2) Accept dataset terms, 3) Run: HF_TOKEN=your_token node scripts/data/fetch-hackaprompt.js
